sentences.sContent: He was narrowly defeated in the election.
sentences.sCn: 他在选举中以微弱差距败北。

sentences.sContent: One bullet struck his car, narrowly missing him.
sentences.sCn: 一颗子弹击中了他的汽车，差点打中他。

sentences.sContent: A man narrowly escaped death when a fire broke out in his home on Sunday morning.
sentences.sCn: 周日早晨一名男子家中起火，险些丧命。
